amendment.description: To devolve acquisition authority from the Office of the Secretary of Defense to the military services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1039 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1039 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5794) To devolve acquisition authority from the Office of the Secretary of Defense to the military services.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1039 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1039 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 1003.
